name: Light Bringers
description:
Light Bringers is an indie platformer that was made in four weeks in a UC Davis class. Explore the underground caverns of a young girl's home and bring her family back by guiding them with pieces of a fractured container of light. Dangerous enemies lurk around every corner, and secrets are hidden within the walls. It is up to you to help your scattered family find their way back home.

WASD to move. SPACE to jump. ESC for pause menu. 

This game is still in Beta, and as such is not completely finished.
